content.description:
Sit start with hands matched on the sidepull. From there, pull up to the generous rail, traverse right along it, abd abandon the rail to the jug and remainder of

Minnesota Nice

.
content.protection: At least a few pads. The start of the problem has a few surrounding rocks, but the end is good.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Matriculant.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a large goosehead.  From there, move up the slight overhang onto the slab. Once on the slab, move up and left of the wave-like feature atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad and spot, the landing is good.
content.location: This is on the East face of Matriculant Boulder.

content.description: Squat start with hands matched on a sidepull.  From there, reach a shallow right hand pocket and a left hand sidepull, paste the feet high, pop the jug, traverse right to the horn, throw a high right foot to an edge, rock over and up through the small tree growing from the boulder and top it out.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter. The landing is decent but slightly rough.
content.location: It is on the East face of Matriculant Boulder.

content.protection: A pair of pads will work. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the east face of Matriculant.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on an undercling. From there, move right to a better undercling, match on it, stick a big move to a right hand sloper-pinch, follow to a left hand edge, pop the feet out from under to the face, and finish up the remaining bumps/jugs to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Matriculant.
